channel.title: programming on AshLogs
channel.description: Recent content in programming on AshLogs

item.title: Scripting with Rust: A basic Guide
item.description: Learn how to use Rust for scripting tasks. Covers primitive Rust scripts with rustc, cargo-script for dependency management, and practical examples of file operations and testing.

item.title: The Art of Multithreading in java(Java programming guide)
item.description: Master Java multithreading: create threads using Runnable interface and Thread class. Learn thread-based concurrency with practical examples.

item.title: What are Generics in Java
item.description: Master Java generics with practical examples. Learn parameterized types, type safety, and how to write reusable code without casting.

item.title: Algorithms : A brief example
item.description: Introduction to algorithms: step-by-step processes for solving problems. Learn key characteristics like definiteness, finiteness, and feasibility.
